---

The light-brown liquid of a _sure-step potion_ helps you find your footing. After drinking it, you gain a +1 item bonus to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) for 1 hour. In addition, you can Step into difficult terrain, and you aren't flat-footed on uneven ground.
